title: Admin Login Success
description: Verify that an Admin user can log in successfully with valid credentials and access all system modules.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid Admin username and password.
Click the login button.
Confirm login is successful and Admin dashboard is displayed with access to all modules.

title: Cashier Login and POS Access
description: Verify that a Cashier user can log in successfully and access only the POS module.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid Cashier username and password.
Click the login button.
Confirm login is successful and POS module is accessible, other admin modules are restricted.

title: Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify that login fails and appropriate error message is shown on entering invalid username or password.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Enter invalid username and/or password.
Click login button.
Verify login fails and appropriate error message is displayed.

title: Create New Ingredient with Valid Details
description: Verify that Admin can successfully add a new ingredient with pricing, units, and measure conversions.

steps.description: Login as Admin.
Navigate to Ingredient Management module.
Click on 'Add Ingredient' button.
Fill all required fields including name, price, unit, and conversion factors with valid data.
Click 'Save'.
Verify the ingredient is added successfully and displayed in the ingredient list.

title: Attempt to Add Ingredient with Missing Mandatory Fields
description: Verify system validation prevents adding an ingredient when mandatory fields are missing and displays proper error messages.

steps.description: Login as Admin.
Navigate to Ingredient Management.
Click 'Add Ingredient'.
Leave required fields empty (e.g., name or price).
Click 'Save'.
Verify validation errors are shown and ingredient is not saved.

title: Create New Recipe with Ingredients and Verify Cost Calculation
description: Verify that Admin can create a recipe by adding ingredients and the system correctly calculates total cost incorporating ingredients, labor, and overhead.

steps.description: Login as Admin.
Navigate to Recipe Management.
Click 'Create New Recipe'.
Enter recipe details including name and description.
Add multiple ingredients with specified quantities.
Enter recipe preparation time for labor costing.
Save the recipe.
Verify recipe is saved, cost breakdown displays ingredient cost, labor cost based on time, and overhead allocation accurately.

title: Update Ingredient and Verify Automatic Cost Recalculation in Recipes
description: Verify that when an ingredient's price or unit is updated, recipes using that ingredient automatically update their total cost.

steps.description: Login as Admin.
Navigate to Ingredient Management.
Update the price or unit of an existing ingredient.
Save changes.
Navigate to Recipe Management.
Open a recipe that uses the updated ingredient.
Verify the total cost of the recipe reflects the updated ingredient pricing dynamically.

title: Configure Financial Parameters and Verify Costing Engine Updates
description: Verify that updating financial settings such as payroll rate, fixed costs, tax rate updates the costing engine and downstream calculations.

steps.description: Login as Admin.
Navigate to Financial Settings.
Update payroll costs, fixed monthly costs, work hours, and tax rates.
Save settings.
Navigate to Recipe Management.
Open any recipe to check costing details.
Verify labor costs and overhead in recipe cost calculations reflect the updated financial parameters.

title: Use Pricing Simulator to Determine Ideal Selling Price
description: Verify that Pricing Simulator correctly calculates ideal selling price based on total costs, desired profit margin, and tax/card fees.

steps.description: Login as Admin.
Navigate to Pricing Simulator.
Input recipe or product details to fetch total cost.
Set desired profit margin percentage.
Input applicable tax rates and card fees.
Run the simulation.
Verify the suggested selling price is correctly calculated and displayed.

title: Open Cash Session and Process Sale in POS
description: Verify Cashier can open a cash session, add products to cart, process payments with various methods, and generate receipt.

steps.description: Login as Cashier.
Open a new cash session.
Add multiple products to sales cart.
Proceed to payment.
Complete payment using cash and card methods separately.
Verify payment is successfully processed and receipt is generated and displayed.

title: Handle Insufficient Payment in POS
description: Verify system prevents completing sale when payment amount is less than total cost and displays appropriate error message.

steps.description: Login as Cashier.
Open cash session and add products to cart.
Attempt to complete payment with amount less than total sale.
Verify that sale is not completed and error message about insufficient payment is shown.

title: Generate Sales and Expense Reports with Updated Data
description: Verify Admin can generate sales and expense reports, and that reports reflect all transactions correctly and remain up-to-date.

steps.description: Login as Admin.
Navigate to Reports and Analytics.
Select sales report and generate for current period.
Select expense report and generate.
Verify reports display correct sales and expense data consistent with recorded transactions including payments and costs.

title: User Management - Add New User and Assign Role
description: Verify Admin can invite new users and assign either Admin or Cashier role with correct permission enforcement post creation.

steps.description: Login as Admin.
Navigate to User Management.
Invite a new user with email and assign role as Cashier.
Save and confirm invitation.
Verify new user is created with Cashier role and has restricted access accordingly.

title: Verify Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that user roles restrict or grant access appropriately; Admin has full access, Cashier access limited to POS only.

steps.description: Login as Admin and verify access to Ingredients, Recipes, Financials, Settings, Reports, User Management, and POS.
Logout and login as Cashier.
Attempt to access modules other than POS like Financials or Settings.
Verify Cashier access is restricted and access denied errors or no navigation options present.

title: Recipe Costing Edge Case: Ingredient Quantity Zero or Negative
description: Verify that system handles zero or negative ingredient quantities in recipes with proper validation and error messaging.

steps.description: Login as Admin.
Create or edit a recipe.
Add an ingredient with quantity zero or negative value.
Attempt to save the recipe.
Verify validation error prevents saving and user is informed of invalid quantity input.

title: Concurrent Updates Handling for Ingredients
description: Verify that concurrent edits on the same ingredient by multiple Admin users are handled gracefully, preventing data corruption.

steps.description: Login as Admin in two separate sessions.
In both sessions, open the same ingredient for editing.
In session one, update price and save.
In session two, try to save different update.
Verify system either merges changes carefully or warns about concurrent modification, preserving data integrity.

title: Responsive UI Verification on Various Devices
description: Verify the UI layout and functionality adapt correctly on desktop, tablet, and mobile browsers enabling smooth workflow.

steps.description: Access the application on desktop browser.
Verify UI is fully functional and properly laid out.
Access the application on tablet device or emulator.
Verify UI rearranges layout properly and all features remain accessible.
Access the application on mobile device or emulator.
Verify UI is responsive with no broken elements and touch interactions work correctly.

title: System Recovery on Network Failure During Save Operations
description: Verify the system handles network interruptions gracefully during saving ingredient, recipe, or transaction data, providing proper user feedback and retry options.

steps.description: Login as Admin or Cashier.
Initiate a save operation (ingredient creation, recipe update, or POS payment) and simulate network failure mid-process.
Verify user is informed of the failure with clear message and options to retry or cancel.

title: Sales Completion Updates Cash Session and Financial Records
description: Verify that each completed sale correctly updates cash session totals and financial records for accurate reporting.

steps.description: Login as Cashier.
Open new cash session.
Process multiple sales to completion.
Logout and login as Admin.
Navigate to Cash History and Financial Reports.
Verify cash session reflects totals accurately including individual sales data and financial reports include these sales correctly.
